verbose_text: Other lead compounds that were already tested by us in in vitro systems for primary cells and metacestode vesicles were pyridinyl imidazoles, directed against p38 mitogen activated protein kinase (MAPK) [XREF_BIBR], Imatinib, and HNMPA (AM) 3.
evidence: directed against p38 mitogen-activated protein kinase (MAPK) [ XREF_BIBR ], Imatinib
